content: <style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>, is today the Pumpkin Lantern Festival? I've never celebrated it before. I'm usually busy planting winter crops this time of year.
info: 日常对话-日常特殊反馈-节日-南灯日-1010云果_特殊反馈
